description:
Stupid, stupid, stupid, stupid! I’m so stupid!! How could I, the great Ichijou Ryouma, not realize this?! Overnight, the entire country is abuzz with talk about the exciting new star IZUMI. It took all of that for me, the great Ichijou Ryouma, to finally realize that Izumi’s debut means the whole world will now learn of his adorableness!
Source: crunchyroll
